update sy_member set member_points = member_points +#{memberPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER} where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT m.member_truename,m.member_id,m.member_avatar,m.member_sex FROM sy_poor_supporter ps , sy_poor p , sy_member m WHERE ps.poor_id = p.poor_id AND p.member_id = m.member_id AND ps.member_id = #{memberId} LIMIT 3

SELECT m.member_id,r.recommend_reason,m.member_truename,m.member_sex,m.member_avatar AS imageUrl,ROUND(IFNULL((a.avg_desccredit+a.avg_servicecredit+a.avg_deliverycredit)/3,0),2) AS storeScore FROM sy_role r INNER JOIN sy_member m ON r.member_id = m.member_id INNER JOIN sy_agent_stats a ON m.member_id = a.member_id AND a.rec_id=(SELECT MAX(rec_id) FROM sy_agent_stats WHERE member_id=r.member_id) AND a.online_goods_count>0 WHERE r.role_type IN (1,2,3,4)
AND r.areaid_3 IN
#{item}
LIMIT 12

SELECT m.member_truename,m.member_id,m.member_disp_name ,m.member_name ,m.member_avatar,m.member_sex,s.store_id FROM sy_member m LEFT JOIN sy_store s ON m.member_id =s.member_id WHERE s.store_id IN
#{item}
